title: Bro Science
description: Rounding out the craptacular spectacle that was 2016 we're eased into the new year by Mike Tornabene (@Mike_Tornabene) of Bro Science and GNARPM. Many of you know Mike as Dom Mazzetti but as of late he has been getting into the automotive world with going from a CTS-V, to a V12 Vantage and finally settling on a tuned McLaren 570s.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
